name: The Haunted House (Amin Hanif Mahmud)
description:
Search for papers only using a flashlight by controlling the character in game, find the papers for him and run to the exit door after you got all of his papers. And be careful of things there which will lead to game over. And attention! enemy can go through walls so you can't hide forever!

Features :

- Simple controller.
- Easy to play.
- Free to play.
- Horror atmosphere.
- Scary music & sounds.
- Flickering flashlight.
- Upcoming new places.
- And more!

Device requirements minimum :

- Android 4.1+ (Jelly beans).
- Dual core processor.
- 512 mb ram.
- Resolution 800x480.

Note : We will try to improve our games ASAP, and we really appreciate your feedback! so please rate 5 star ratings to help us get future update. Thanks!

And please donate us :D
